p: The flavonoid-derived compounds from E. myriochaetum were analyzed in silico using the Prediction of Activity Spectra for Substances (PASS ®) v2017 software (available to download at http://www.pharmaexpert.ru/passonline/). The molecular structure was predicted through this program, thus determining the compounds’ biological probability of being active (Pa) or inactive (Pi) [ 43].
